title: Chronic Kidney Disease
text: CKD symptoms include swelling, fatigue, and changes in urination.

title: Hypertension
text: High blood pressure may cause long-term damage to heart and kidneys.

title: Kidney Transplant
text: Transplant eligibility is based on clinical factors, donor matching, and overall health.

title: Diabetes and CKD
text: Diabetes is the leading cause of kidney failure worldwide, especially Type 2.

title: Blood Pressure Management
text: Managing blood pressure is critical to prevent kidney damage.
